00033 UpdateSchemaDispatchHandler::UpdateSchemaDispatchHandler(
00034     const TableIdentifier &table, const char *schema, Comm *comm,
00035     time_t timeout)
00036   : m_outstanding(0), m_client(comm, timeout), m_schema(schema),
00037   m_table_name(table.name) {
00038   memcpy(&m_table, &table, sizeof(TableIdentifier));
00039   m_table.name = m_table_name.c_str();
00040   return;
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 void UpdateSchemaDispatchHandler::add(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00045   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00046   String addr_str = InetAddr::format(addr);
00047 
00048   try {
00049     m_pending_addrs[addr_str] = &addr;
00050     m_client.update_schema(addr, m_table, m_schema, this);
00051     m_outstanding++;
00052   }
00053   catch (Exception &e) {
00054     ErrorResult result;
00055     result.addr = addr;
00056     result.error = e.code();
00057     result.msg = "Send error";
00058     m_errors.push_back(result);
00059   }
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 void UpdateSchemaDispatchHandler::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00064   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00065   ErrorResult result;
00066   String addr_str;
00067 
00068   if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00069     if ((result.error = Protocol::response_code(event_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00070       result.addr = event_ptr->addr;
00071       result.msg = Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr);
00072       m_errors.push_back(result);
00073     }
00074     else {
00075       // Successful response
00076       addr_str = InetAddr::format(event_ptr->addr);
00077       if (m_pending_addrs.erase(addr_str) == 0) {
00078         String expected_addrs;
00079         std::map<String, struct sockaddr_in *>::iterator iter;
00080 
00081         for(iter=m_pending_addrs.begin(); iter != m_pending_addrs.end();
00082             ++iter) {
00083           expected_addrs += "'" + iter->first + "' ";
00084         }
00085         HT_FATAL_OUT << "Received 'update schema ack' from unexpected addr '"
00086             << addr_str << "' expected one of " << expected_addrs << HT_END ;
00087       }
00088     }
00089   }
00090   else {
00091     result.error = event_ptr->error;
00092     result.addr = event_ptr->addr;
00093     result.msg = "";
00094     m_errors.push_back(result);
00095   }
00096   m_outstanding--;
00097 
00098   if (m_outstanding == 0)
00099     m_cond.notify_all();
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 void UpdateSchemaDispatchHandler::retry() {
00104   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00105   std::map<String, struct sockaddr_in *>::iterator iter;
00106 
00107   try {
00108     m_errors.clear();
00109     for(iter=m_pending_addrs.begin(); iter != m_pending_addrs.end(); ++iter) {
00110       m_client.update_schema(*(iter->second), m_table, m_schema, this);
00111       m_outstanding++;
00112     }
00113   }
00114   catch (Exception &e) {
00115     ErrorResult result;
00116     result.addr = *(iter->second);
00117     result.error = e.code();
00118     result.msg = "Send error";
00119     m_errors.push_back(result);
00120   }
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 bool UpdateSchemaDispatchHandler::wait_for_completion() {
00125   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00126   while (m_outstanding > 0)
00127     m_cond.wait(lock);
00128   return m_errors.empty();
00129 }

00131 
00132 void UpdateSchemaDispatchHandler::get_errors(std::vector<ErrorResult> &errors) {
00133   errors = m_errors;
00134 }
